name: AUSSDA Dataverse
description: The Austrian Social Science Data Archive (AUSSDA) provides a repository for research data and related material, supporting the sharing, preservation, citation, exploration, and analysis of social science data. Its metadata are structured using Data Documentation Initiative (DDI) and CESSDA ERIC standards, facilitating integration with the European CESSDA data catalogue and European Science Cloud (EOSC) for enhanced visibility and interoperability.
data_themes: Science and technology, Research and experimental development
